product_name: Kurgo Portsmouth Bucket Seat Cover - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A little hesitant about your 4-legged friend riding shotgun with you? The Portsmouth Bucket Seat Cover will protect your fine leather upholstery from Fido's sharp claws and shedding fur.
short_description: A little hesitant about your 4-legged friend riding shotgun with you? The Portsmouth Bucket Seat Cover will protect your fine leather upholstery from Fido's sharp claws and shedding fur.
